meanings.definition: Born as a free person, not a slave.
meanings.sent1: The young girl was proud to be freeborn and not enslaved.
meanings.sent2: The freeborn citizens enjoyed their rights and freedoms.
meanings.sent3: The freeborn puppy happily roamed the yard, not tied up like the others.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as free as a freeborn bird soaring in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The freeborn flowers danced in the wind, untouched by chains.

meanings.definition: Having the status of being born free.
meanings.sent1: He was a freeborn man, never having known the shackles of slavery.
meanings.sent2: The freeborn princess lived in a castle, surrounded by luxury.
meanings.sent3: The freeborn kitten refused to be kept indoors, always escaping to explore.
meanings.sent4: His mind was as free as a freeborn horse galloping through the fields.
meanings.sent5: The freeborn spirit of the land could be felt in the rustling leaves and babbling brooks.
